title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times, which is inefficient.
EB: Only the newly appended lines should be redrawn during text change with word wrap in StyledText.
SR:
1. Open StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines.
3. Observe that only the newly appended lines are redrawn.
